info.description: This is the backend API for the BPL project.
info.title: BPL Backend API

get.description: Retrieve all user achievements in the system.

post.description: Add new achievement to the system.

patch.description: Update achievements for all users based on their current progress.

post.description: Add a new engagement or increment existing engagement number

get.description: Fetches all events
Fetches an event by id
Get calculated active times for all users in an event

parameters.description: Threshold in seconds to consider a user active before and after an activity (default: 300)
parameters.name: threshold_seconds

get.description: Get calculated active times for a user in an event

parameters.description: Threshold in seconds to consider a user active before and after an activity (default: 300)
parameters.name: threshold_seconds

get.description: Get atlas trees for your team for an event
Get all characters for an event
Get the ladder for an event
Gets all objectives for an event
Get valid mappings for conditions
Gets objective validations for an event

post.description: Validates item objectives for an event seeing if there are completions on trade

get.description: Gets an objective by id
Fetches the latest scores for the current event
Websocket for simple score updates.
Websocket for score updates. Once connected, the client will receive score updates in real-time.
Fetches the scoring presets for the current event

delete.description: Deletes a scoring preset by id

get.description: Fetches all signups for the event
Fetches an authenticated user's signup for the event

put.description: Creates a signup for the authenticated user
Reports the actual playtime for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes a user's signup for the event

get.description: Gets the status for an event including the user's application status
Fetches all twitch streams for the current event
Fetches all submissions for an event

put.description: Submits a bounty for an event

get.description: Fetches all suggestions for your team for an event

put.description: Creates a suggestion for an objective for your team for an event

delete.description: Deletes a suggestion for an objective for your team for an event

get.description: Fetches all teams for an event

put.description: Creates a team for an event

get.description: Fetches a team by id
Get item wishes for a team in an event

post.description: Create an item wish for a user in a team

delete.description: Delete an item wish for a user in a team

patch.description: Change an item wish for a user in a team

get.description: Fetches all users for an event
Fetches the atlas progression for a user in an event
Get all recurring jobs

post.description: Logs in the discord bot (only for internal use)

get.description: Redirects to an oauth provider

parameters.description: Last URL to redirect to after oauth is finished
parameters.name: last_url

get.description: Retrieve the current timing configurations for various operations.

put.description: Update the timing configurations for various operations.

get.description: Fetches all users

post.description: Removes an authentication provider from the authenticated user

get.description: Fetches the authenticated user

patch.description: Updates the authenticated users display name

get.description: Fetches a user by ID

patch.description: Changes the permissions of a user

get.description: Fetches all event characters for a user
Get all character data for an event for a user
Get all PoB exports for a character
Fetches all guild stash tabs for a user

post.description: Parses all user access for guild stash tabs

get.description: Fetches a specific guild stash tab

patch.description: Enables fetching for a specific guild stash tab

post.description: Fetches current items for specific guild stash tab

get.description: Get all guilds for current event with their respective team ids

put.description: Saves a guild for the current event

get.description: Fetches log entries for a guild in an event

parameters.description: Name of the user doing the action (Make sure to replace the pound sign with a minus)
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Name of the item (Can be partial)
parameters.name: itemname

post.description: Adds a new entry to the guild stash history

get.description: Fetches the latest timestamp for a user's guild stash history
